content: four way v_stitch beanie created by kathy s crochet closet www kathyscrochetcloset etsy com this versatile pattern lets you create four different hats using worsted weight yarn and a size j crochet hook caron simply soft yarn works well for these hats but any worsted weight yarn will do the hats are crocheted in the round the same first eleven rounds are used for all four hats then directions are given for the variations beanie button beanie slouchy beanie and slouchy button beanie you will want to make all four the finished beanies will measure approximately 7 ½ inches from the top of the hat to the edge the finished slouchy beanies will measure approximately 9 ½ inches from the top of the hat to the edge the hats should fit a head circumference between 19 and 23 materials size j - 6mm crochet hook worsted weight size 4 yarn one skein yarn needle for weaving in ends 1 button for button version of hats with holes large enough for yarn needle to pass through 1 | p age four way v_stitch beanie stitches chain chain double_crochet double_crochet single_crochet single_crochet decrease single_crochet two together also called decrease slip_stitch slip_stitch v-st v_stitch double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet all done in the same stitch how to decrease insert hook in first stitch yarn over and draw up a loop insert hook in second stitch yarn over and draw up a loop yarn over and draw through all three loops on hook gauge first three rounds should measure 4 inches across starting rounds for all four hats starting ring chain 3 join to first chain with a slip_stitch to form a ring round 1 chain 4 and double_crochet in ring counts as first v_stitch do 5 more v-st in ring join with slip_stitch to third chain of starting chain 6 v st total round 2 slip_stitch in chain 1 space of first v st below chain 4 and double_crochet in same chain 1 space counts as first v-st do 1 more v-st in same space *2 v-st in next chain 1 space repeat from * around join with slip_stitch to third chain of starting chain 12 v-st total round 3 slip_stitch in first chain 1 space chain 4 and double_crochet in same chain 1 space do 1 more v-st in same space v-st in next chain 1 space *2 v-st in next chain 1 space 1 v-st in next chain 1 space repeat from * around join with slip_stitch to third chain of starting chain 18 v-st total round 4 slip_stitch in first chain 1 space chain 4 and double_crochet in same chain 1 space do 1 more v-st in same space v-st in next 2 chain 1 spaces *2 v-st in next chain 1 space v-st in next 2 chain 1 spaces repeat from * around join with slip_stitch to third chain of starting chain 24 v-st total rnds 5-11 slip_stitch in first chain 1 space chain 4 and double_crochet in same chain
